timeline.bodyText: these files don't seem to be used.

replies.bodyText: please either remove or add tests that use these.
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
RestTemplateAuthTokenModifierInterceptorTest sends a request to Wiremock server. Wiremock matches the incoming request to this JSON and sends a response body as configured. This file is required for the test.
Please review and approve the PR.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: the test you are referring to, only seems to assert that statusCode is correct, it doesn't seem to be verifying the response content
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Added wiremock verify step to check new access token is used to make the API call and assert that 200 OK status returned.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc
